Steps: Open /en/login and click Continue with Google
ExpectedResult: User is redirected to dashboard without auth error

Steps: Enter new email and password, click Create account
ExpectedResult: Account is created and user is signed in

Steps: Try signing in with wrong password
ExpectedResult: Readable auth error is shown

Steps: Click Reset password and submit email
ExpectedResult: Reset email is sent and UI confirms

Steps: Click Sign out in dashboard
ExpectedResult: Session ends and protected view closes

Steps: Sign in and refresh browser
ExpectedResult: User remains signed in

Steps: Fill list form with title slug event template visibility Public and submit
ExpectedResult: List is created and appears under My lists

Steps: Try creating list with existing slug
ExpectedResult: Slug taken error is shown

Steps: Use invalid slug format or too short slug
ExpectedResult: Form blocks submit or shows validation error

Steps: Create list with visibility Private
ExpectedResult: List is created and not publicly accessible

Steps: Select active list fill name and description and submit
ExpectedResult: Item is added to list

Steps: Add gift item with image file
ExpectedResult: Image uploads and is shown in item card

Steps: Add gift item with video file
ExpectedResult: Video uploads and can be played

Steps: Try uploading unsupported file type like txt
ExpectedResult: Upload fails with validation message

Steps: Mark item as gifted then mark available
ExpectedResult: Status updates correctly in UI

Steps: Click Delete on existing item
ExpectedResult: Item is removed from list

Steps: Add story title and body and submit
ExpectedResult: Story appears in story section

Steps: Add story with image or video
ExpectedResult: Story media is visible and playable

Steps: Delete existing story entry
ExpectedResult: Story is removed

TestCase: Add wheel question with text answer
Steps: Add question and text answer and submit
ExpectedResult: Wheel entry is created

TestCase: Add wheel question with audio answer
Steps: Add question and audio answer and submit
ExpectedResult: Audio is uploaded and playable

Steps: Delete existing wheel entry
ExpectedResult: Entry is removed

Steps: Open /{slug} for public list
ExpectedResult: Public list page loads with list data

Steps: Reserve available item as guest
ExpectedResult: Reservation is stored and item becomes reserved

Steps: Try reserving same item in two sessions
ExpectedResult: Only first reservation succeeds

Steps: Open private list slug as guest
ExpectedResult: Page is blocked or not found

Steps: Open public list with story entries
ExpectedResult: Stories are visible and correct

Steps: Spin wheel and reveal answer
ExpectedResult: Question is selected and answer is shown

Steps: Open /api/billing/config
ExpectedResult: JSON response returns mode and flags

Steps: Click Activate 90-day pass in dashboard
ExpectedResult: List access state updates from trial to active

Steps: Test list with expired trial and no paid access
ExpectedResult: Public access is blocked and owner sees expiry state

Steps: Toggle EN and ET
ExpectedResult: Language changes and locale route updates

Steps: Open /et/dashboard and inspect labels
ExpectedResult: Core actions and labels are translated

Steps: Test navigation across EN ET and slug routes
ExpectedResult: Locale routing remains consistent

Steps: Open dashboard in mobile viewport 360x800
ExpectedResult: No horizontal overflow and forms are usable

Steps: Open public list page on mobile viewport
ExpectedResult: Cards text and buttons remain usable

Steps: Test at 768px and 1440px
ExpectedResult: Layout remains stable and readable

Steps: Open /sitemap.xml and /robots.txt
ExpectedResult: Both endpoints return valid responses

Steps: Call /api/cron/purge-expired?dryRun=1 with x-cron-secret header
ExpectedResult: Response returns ok true and stats
